publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1614# Trish Godman: Hospices—That the Parliament praises the contribution of hospices across Scotland in providing loving care and support to both patients and their families; acknowledges the contribution of staff, volunteers and local fundraisers to the hospice service; believes that the health boards should meet 50% of the running costs of hospices as set out in Management Executive Letter NHS MEL (1994) 104, and urges the Scottish Executive to address the funding shortfall for Scotland’s only children’s hospice, Rachel House in Kinross. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
